page.title: 16LOCAL HISTORY AND CHANGE
page.content: We interviewed Miss Bodycombe and Mr Lloyd Jones,who have lived in the area around the school all of their lives. They told us of the many changes that have taken place.Here are some of them. 1.All around this area there were green fields and farms,with just a few houses dotted here and there.The copper smelting industry,which had ruined the green Swansea valley had not spoilt the beauty of this area. Gradually since the war many council estates had been built in Winchwen, Bonymaen,Trallwn,Talycopa and Llansamlet.These estates swallowed up the green fields. 2.There was a private track leading through the present site of our school.This was owned by Squire Smith and it led from his mansion at Gwern Llwynchwyth house to a summer house.
